body.p: To open the CSS Validator preferences page, go to Options Window Preferences oXygen XML Editor Author CSS Validator .
You can configure the following options for the built-in CSS validator of :

ul.li: Profile - Selects one of the available validation profiles: CSS 1, CSS 2, CSS 2.1, CSS 3, CSS 3 with Oxygen extensions, SVG, SVG Basic, SVG Tiny, Mobile, TV Profile, ATSC TV Profile. The CSS 3 with Oxygen extensions profile includes all the CSS 3 standard properties and the CSS extensions specific for OxygenCSS extensions specific for Oxygen that can be used in Author modeAuthor mode. That means all Oxygen specific extensions are accepted in a CSS stylesheet by the built-in CSS validator when this profile is selected.
Media type - Selects one of the available mediums: all, aural, braille, embossed, handheld, print, projection, screen, tty, tv, presentation, oxygen.
Warning level - Sets the minimum severity level for reported validation warnings. Can be one of: All, Normal, Most Important, No Warnings.
